# This project is about loading ES modules in an iframe and communicating between the main app and the iframe using postMessage.

- Editor can edit the code (files, html, js) and reload the iframe with the updated code.
- packages are loaded in the iframe via esm.sh

## app structure

### editor
/editor
/editor/editor.html
/editor/editor.js


### iframe
/iframe
/iframe/iframe.html
/iframe/iframe.js
